page.title: 12Living in Rural Essex 2.
page.content: {Home life { }Being a very rural area family life tends to be more complete, responsibilities to the family are taken seriously so few problems with homeless youngers and elderly people - they are helped to live in the community either by their families and/or by good neighbours-many people cook meals etc. for elderly neighbours and generally help to take care of them. One parent families also get lots of help from neighbours etc. Household safety generally good. Many people have pets-dogs, cats, rabbits, ferrets, budgies etc. Many people grow their own food, and preserve food some aiming for self sufficiency.
